statements: UPDATE Episodes SET download_count = 100 WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE Episodes SET episode_description = 'New episode description', platform = 'Podcast' WHERE episode_id = 2;
UPDATE Episodes SET episode_description = 'New Episode Description', publication_date = '2022-10-15', download_count = 100 WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE Episodes SET episode_duration = 45, platform = 'Apple Podcasts' WHERE episode_id = 2;
UPDATE episodes SET duration = 30 WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE feedback SET listener_name = 'John Doe', rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 3;
UPDATE episodes SET duration = 30, description = 'Updated episode description' WHERE episode_id = 1
UPDATE feedback SET rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Awesome episode!' WHERE feedback_id = 3
UPDATE PodcastEpisode SET episode_title = 'Updated Title', episode_description = 'New Description' WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE ListenerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great episode, loved it!', feedback_date = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE feedback_id = 3;
UPDATE PodcastEpisode SET episode_title = 'New Title', episode_duration = 45 WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE ListenerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great episode, really enjoyed it!', feedback_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE feedback_id = 2;
UPDATE episodes SET description = 'New season premiere' WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE feedback SET rating = 5, comment = 'Great episode!' WHERE episode_id = 3 AND listener_id = 101;
UPDATE episodes SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE listeners SET location = 'New York' WHERE listener_id = 3;
UPDATE episodes SET duration = '00:30:00' WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE feedback SET rating = 5, comment = 'Great episode!' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE episodes SET duration = '00:25:00' WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE listeners SET email = 'newemail@example.com', subscription_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE listener_id = 3;
